description: Situated on the fifth floor of the Hotel Bulgari with views of the Mausoleum of Augustus, Il Ristorante - Niko Romito boasts a spacious terrace and an elegant, welcoming dining room with mahogany walls adorned with works of art. The menu features traditional Italian cuisine reinterpreted with a light and imaginative touch as demonstrated by memorable dishes such as the chef’s own take on classic spaghetti in a tomato sauce.
